name: bingus-geocoder
description: A cute geocoding application with bubblegum aesthetics

scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p ./dist/static/js && cp -r ./static/js/. ./dist/static/js && mkdir -p ./dist/static/images && cp -r ./static/images/. ./dist/static/images && mkdir -p ./dist/static/fonts && cp -r ./static/fonts/. ./dist/static/fonts
scripts.vercel-build: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets
